comment.author: 22070130@N07
comment._content:
A great shot, but a tragic sight. 
I never realised that the Grey River is so dangerous, but then again, the West Coast can be pretty rough...

comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: Terrible event, but what a wonderful photograph!

comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content: @Jens @Lu There are many shipwreck photographs in our collections - some of them are extremely poignant. I suppose today we have no conception of just how risky sea travel was. -- Courtney
comment.authorname: National Library NZ on The Commons

comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: With storms hitting the US, there's a spooky coincidence that this one ran aground on this day 104 years ago
